scheme_name: Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank: For Poultry Development (Tamil Nadu)
description: This scheme provides loans through Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Banks for poultry development to promote poultry farming in Tamil Nadu.

category_criteria: Open to farmers and residents of Tamil Nadu
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a member of the cooperative bank

steps: Approach the Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank
Submit loan application with required documents
